bibl.title: Las magas de Sofrón en el papiro PSI 1214 A.
bibl.note: P.S.I. XI, 1214 (= M.-P.3 1482; LDAB 3961). - Analyses a series of linguistic errors made by the alleged sorcerer, revealing his fraud, and tries to place the fragment within the work of the mimographer: it seems to belong to the female mime Ταὶ γυναῖκες αἳ τὰν θεόν φαντι ἐξελᾶν. - Avec résumés en espagnol et en anglais.
bibl.seg: Javier Verdejo Manchado, Las magas de Sofrón en el papiro PSI 1214 A.

P.S.I. XI, 1214 (= M.-P.3 1482; LDAB 3961). - Analyses a series of linguistic errors made by the alleged sorcerer, revealing his fraud, and tries to place the fragment within the work of the mimographer: it seems to belong to the female mime Ταὶ γυναῖκες αἳ τὰν θεόν φαντι ἐξελᾶν. - Avec résumés en espagnol et en anglais.
